org.hibernate.search.backend.jgroups.impl

Class DispatchMessageSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hibernate.search.backend.jgroups.impl.DispatchMessageSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageSenderService, Service, Startable, Stoppable

    public final class DispatchMessageSender
extends Object
implements MessageSenderService, Startable, Stoppable
    We use the MessageDispatcher instead of the JChannel to be able to use blocking operations (optionally) without having to rely on the RSVP protocol being configured on the stack.
    Author:
    Lukasz Moren, Sanne Grinovero (C) 2012 Red Hat Inc., Ales Justin, Hardy Ferentschik
